Item ID20178

Steel full helm (g) is a part of steel gold-trimmed armour and a reward from easy Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as a normal Steel full helm, and requires level 5 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+9+10+7-1+9
 Other bonusesSlot

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The helmet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

[[File:Steel full helm (g) chathead.png|left]]
'''Steel full helm (g)''' is a part of [[steel gold-trimmed armour]] and a reward from [[Clue scroll (easy)|easy]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It has the same stats as a normal [[Steel full helm]], and requires level 5 [[Defence]] to wear. This item '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.
